summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Building and Construction Codes: adding a new Chapter 22.150, the Seattle Residential Code, to the Seattle Municipal Code; adopting Chapters 2 through 10, 12 through 19, 22 through 24, and 43 of the 2003 International Residential Code; amending Chapters 2, Definitions, Chapter 3, Building Planning, Chapter 10, Chimneys and Fireplaces, Chapter 24, Fuel Gas, and Chapter 43, Referenced Standards; and adding a new Chapter 1 related to administration, permitting and enforcement.
